trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to apply layout logic to all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Força o controlo para aplicarem a lógica de esquema para todos os respectivos controlos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method was called before calling the PerformLayout method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>método foi chamado antes de chamar o método PerformLayout, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>evento é suprimido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> created are set to `null` if no values were provided when the PerformLayout method was called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs>criados são definidas `null` se não existem valores fornecidos ao chamar o método PerformLayout.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to apply layout logic to all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Força o controlo para aplicarem a lógica de esquema para todos os respectivos controlos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method was called before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>método foi chamado antes de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>método, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>evento é suprimido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `affectedControl` and `affectedProperty` parameters can both be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: O `affectedControl` e `affectedProperty` parâmetros podem ser definidos como `null`.

trans-unit.source: Doing so causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> created to be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Fazer causas assim o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs>criada para ser definido como `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the most recently changed control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que representa o máximo partido recentemente alterada controlo.

trans-unit.source: The name of the most recently changed property on the control.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade mais recentemente alterada no controlo.

trans-unit.source: Computes the location of the specified screen point into client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Calcula a localização do ponto de ecrã especificado em coordenadas de cliente.

trans-unit.source: The screen coordinate <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to convert.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada do ecrã <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> converter.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the converted , p, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A que representa o convertida , p , em coordenadas do cliente.

trans-unit.source: Computes the location of the specified client point into screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Calcula a localização do ponto de cliente especificado em coordenadas do ecrã.

trans-unit.source: The client coordinate <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to convert.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada do cliente <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> converter.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the converted , p, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A que representa o convertida , p , em coordenadas de ecrã.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of a rectangular area into which the control can fit.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho de uma área retangular na qual pode ajustar o controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> containing the height and width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que contém a altura e largura, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Preprocesses keyboard or input messages within the message loop before they are dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Preprocesses teclado ou mensagens de entrada dentro do ciclo de mensagem antes de estes são distribuídos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> that represents the message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> que representa a mensagem a processar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PreProcessControlState"></xref> values, depending on whether <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and whether <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar*> are <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PreProcessControlState"></xref> values, depending on whether <>*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and whether <>*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar*> are <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar*>

trans-unit.source: Preprocesses keyboard or input messages within the message loop before they are dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Preprocesses teclado ou mensagens de entrada dentro do ciclo de mensagem antes de estes são distribuídos.

trans-unit.source: PreProcessMessage is called by the application's message loop to preprocess input messages before they are dispatched.
trans-unit.target: PreProcessMessage é designado por ciclo de mensagens da aplicação para processar previamente os mensagens de entrada antes de estes são distribuídos.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the `msg` parameter are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR.
trans-unit.target: Valores possíveis para o `msg` parâmetro estão WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR e WM_SYSCHAR.

trans-unit.source: When overriding PreProcessMessage, a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the message.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir PreProcessMessage, deverá devolver um controlo `true` para indicar que processou a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: For messages that are not processed by the control, the result of `base.PreProcessMessage` should be returned.
trans-unit.target: Para as mensagens que não são processadas pelo controlo, o resultado da `base.PreProcessMessage` deve ser devolvido.

trans-unit.source: Controls will typically override one of the more specialized methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A> instead of overriding PreProcessMessage.
trans-unit.target: Controlos, normalmente, irão substituir um dos métodos mais especializados, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A>em vez de substituir PreProcessMessage.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, transmitida por referência, que representa a mensagem a processar.

trans-unit.source: The possible values are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR.
trans-unit.target: Os valores possíveis são WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR e WM_SYSCHAR.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem foi processada pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> evento quando uma tecla é premida enquanto o foco está neste controlo.

trans-unit.source: Some key presses, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys, are typically ignored by some controls because they are not considered input key presses.
trans-unit.target: Alguns presses chaves, como o SEPARADOR, devolver, ESC e teclas de seta, normalmente, são ignorados por alguns controlos porque que não são consideradas entradas presses chaves.

trans-unit.source: For example, by default, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> control ignores the arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, por predefinição, um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>controlo ignora as teclas de seta.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Pressing the arrow keys typically causes the focus to move to the previous or next control.
trans-unit.target: Premir as teclas de seta normalmente faz com que o foco mover para o controlo anterior ou seguinte.

trans-unit.source: The arrow keys are considered navigation keys and pressing these keys typically do not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event for a<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: As teclas de seta são consideradas chaves de navegação e premindo, normalmente, estas chaves não accionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>evento para<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: However, pressing the arrow keys for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> does raise the PreviewKeyDown event.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, premindo a seta chaves para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>accionar o evento de PreviewKeyDown.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: By handling the PreviewKeyDown event for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A> property to `true`, you can raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event when the arrow keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar o evento de PreviewKeyDown para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>e definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A>propriedade para `true`, pode aumentar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>eventos quando são premidas as teclas de seta.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: However, if you handle the arrow keys, the focus will no longer move to the previous or next control.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se a processar as teclas de seta, o foco já não irá mover para o controlo anterior ou seguinte.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Os processos de uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado durante a mensagem pré-processamentos para processar chaves de comando.

trans-unit.source: Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys.
trans-unit.target: As chaves de comando são chaves têm sempre precedência sobre as chaves de entrada regulares.

trans-unit.source: Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: Exemplos de chaves de comando incluem Aceleradores e atalhos de menu.

trans-unit.source: The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key.
trans-unit.target: O método tem de devolver `true` para indicar que processou a chave de comando ou `false` para indicar que a chave não é uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: Este método só é chamado quando o controlo está alojado numa aplicação de Windows Forms ou como um controlo ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: The ProcessCmdKey method first determines whether the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, and if so, enables the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> to process the command key.
trans-unit.target: O método ProcessCmdKey determina primeiro se o controlo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>e se assim for, ativa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>para processar a chave de comando.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If the command key is not a menu shortcut and the control has a parent, the key is passed to the parent's ProcessCmdKey method.
trans-unit.target: Se a chave de comando não é um atalho de menu e o controlo tem um elemento principal, a chave é transmitida ao método de ProcessCmdKey do elemento principal.

trans-unit.source: The net effect is that command keys are "bubbled" up the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: O efeito net é que as chaves são "bubbled" ascendentemente na hierarquia de controlo de comando.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the key the user pressed, the key data also indicates which, if any, modifier keys were pressed at the same time as the key.
trans-unit.target: Para além da chave de premido do utilizador, os dados de chave também indica que, se existirem, as chaves do modificador foram premidas ao mesmo tempo que a chave.

trans-unit.source: Modifier keys include the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: Chaves de modificador incluem as chaves SHIFT, CTRL e ALT.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, transmitida por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caráter foi processado pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog character.
trans-unit.target: Processa um caráter de caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters, such as control mnemonics.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado durante a mensagem pré-processamentos para lidar com carateres de caixa de diálogo, como mnemonics de controlo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the character.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado apenas se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>método indica que o controlo não está a processar o caráter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogChar method simply sends the character to the parent's ProcessDialogChar method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: O método ProcessDialogChar simplesmente envia o caráter para o método de ProcessDialogChar de principal ou devolve `false` se o controlo não tem um principal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog characters.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>classe substitui este método para efetuar o processamento real das carateres de caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: Este método só é chamado quando o controlo está alojado numa aplicação de Windows Forms ou como um controlo ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O carácter a processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caráter foi processado pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: Os processos de uma chave de caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters, such as TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado durante a mensagem pré-processamentos para lidar com carateres de caixa de diálogo, tal como chaves de SEPARADOR, devolver, ESC e seta.

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado apenas se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>método indica que o controlo não está a processar a chave.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogKey simply sends the character to the parent's ProcessDialogKey method, or returns `false`if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: O ProcessDialogKey simplesmente envia o caráter para o método de ProcessDialogKey de principal ou devolve `false`se o controlo não tem um principal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>classe substitui este método para efetuar o processamento real das chaves de caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: Este método só é chamado quando o controlo está alojado numa aplicação de Windows Forms ou como um controlo ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave foi processada pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a key message and generates the appropriate control events.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma mensagem a chave e gera os eventos de controlo adequado.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado quando um controlo recebe uma mensagem de teclado.

trans-unit.source: The method is responsible for generating the appropriate key events for the message by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O método é responsável pela geração os eventos de chaves adequados para a mensagem ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message that must be processed.
trans-unit.target: O `m` parâmetro contém a mensagem de janela tem de ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, WM_SYSKEYUP, and WM_IME_CHAR.
trans-unit.target: Valores possíveis para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade são WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, WM_SYSKEYUP e WM_IME_CHAR.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, transmitida por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem foi processada pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma mensagem de teclado.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado quando um controlo recebe uma mensagem de teclado.

trans-unit.source: The method first determines whether the control has a parent; if so, it calls the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método determina primeiro se o controlo tem um elemento principal; Se Sim, aquele invoca o principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A> method does not process the message then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs%2A> method is called to generate the appropriate keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: Se o principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>método não processar a mensagem a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs%2A>método é chamado para gerar os eventos de teclado adequado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message that must be processed.
trans-unit.target: O `m` parâmetro contém a mensagem de janela tem de ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP.
trans-unit.target: Valores possíveis para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade são WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP e WM_SYSKEYUP.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, transmitida por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem foi processada pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Previews a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Previews uma mensagem de teclado.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by a child control when the child control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado por um controlo subordinado quando o controlo subordinado recebe uma mensagem de teclado.

trans-unit.source: The child control calls this method before generating any keyboard events for the message.
trans-unit.target: O controlo subordinado chama este método antes de gerar quaisquer eventos de teclado para a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the child control considers the message processed and does not generate any keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: Se este método devolve `true`, o controlo subordinado considera as mensagens processadas e não gera quaisquer eventos de teclado.

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message to preview.
trans-unit.target: O `m` parâmetro contém a mensagem de janela de pré-visualização.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP.
trans-unit.target: Valores possíveis para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade são WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP e WM_SYSKEYUP.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessKeyPreview method simply sends the character to the parent's ProcessKeyPreview method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: O método ProcessKeyPreview simplesmente envia o caráter para o método de ProcessKeyPreview de principal ou devolve `false` se o controlo não tem um principal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>classe substitui este método para efetuar o processamento real das chaves de caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, transmitida por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem foi processada pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Processa um caráter mnemónica.

trans-unit.source: This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado para dar a oportunidade de processar um caráter mnemónica de um controlo.

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: O método deve determinar se o controlo está em estado de processo mnemonics e se se o caráter especificado representa uma mnemónica ser exigido.

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se Sim, o método deve executar a ação associada mnemónica ser exigido e devolver `true`.

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se não, o método deverá devolver `false`.

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: As implementações deste método, muitas vezes, utilizam o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>método para determinar se o caráter especificado corresponde a uma mnemónica ser exigido no texto do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example: ```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` This default implementation of the ProcessMnemonic method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo: ```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` esta implementação predefinida do método ProcessMnemonic simplesmente devolve `false` para indicar que o controlo não tem nenhum mnemónica ser exigido.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O carácter a processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caráter foi processado como uma mnemónica ser exigido pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the product name of the assembly containing the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de produto da assemblagem que contém o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The ProductName property is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ProductName é uma propriedade só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: To change the value of this property, set the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute.Product%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o valor desta propriedade, defina o <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute.Product%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute>.</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute> </xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute.Product%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of C# code sets the ProductName property.
trans-unit.target: A seguinte linha de código c# define a propriedade ProductName.

trans-unit.source: ``` [assembly: AssemblyProduct("MyApplication")] ``` > [!NOTE] > It is strongly recommended that you provide the company name, product name, and product version.
trans-unit.target: ``` [assembly: AssemblyProduct("MyApplication")] ``` > [!NOTE]> É vivamente recomendado que forneça o nome da empresa, o nome do produto e a versão de produto.

trans-unit.source: Providing this information enables the use of Windows Forms features such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> that make it easier to write applications that comply with the "Certified for Windows" program.
trans-unit.target: Fornecer estas informações como a permite a utilização das funcionalidades do Windows Forms <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>que tornam mais fácil escrever aplicações que estão em conformidade com o programa de "Certificado para Windows".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Certified for Windows program, see http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o programa de certificados para o Windows, consulte http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification.

trans-unit.source: The product name of the assembly containing the control.
trans-unit.target: O nome de produto da assemblagem que contém o controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the assembly containing the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a versão da assemblagem que contém o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The ProductVersion property is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ProductVersion é uma propriedade só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: To change the value of this property, set the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute.Version%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o valor desta propriedade, defina o <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute.Version%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute>.</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute> </xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute.Version%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of C# code sets the ProductVersion property.
trans-unit.target: A seguinte linha de código c# define a propriedade ProductVersion.

trans-unit.source: ``` [assembly: AssemblyVersion("1.0.1")] ``` > [!NOTE] > It is strongly recommended that you provide the company name, product name, and product version.
trans-unit.target: ``` [assembly: AssemblyVersion("1.0.1")] ``` > [!NOTE]> É vivamente recomendado que forneça o nome da empresa, o nome do produto e a versão de produto.

trans-unit.source: Providing this information enables the use of Windows Forms features such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> that make it easier to write applications that comply with the "Certified for Windows" program.
trans-unit.target: Fornecer estas informações como a permite a utilização das funcionalidades do Windows Forms <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>que tornam mais fácil escrever aplicações que estão em conformidade com o programa de "Certificado para Windows".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Certified for Windows program, see http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o programa de certificados para o Windows, consulte http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification.

trans-unit.source: The file version of the assembly containing the control.
trans-unit.target: A versão do ficheiro da assemblagem que contém o controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents a propagating IME mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objecto que representa um modo IME propagating.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a propagating IME mode.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa um modo IME propagating.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> is providing help to accessibility applications.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> está a fornecer ajuda para aplicações de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to enable users to invoke help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key.
trans-unit.target: Deve utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>classe para permitir aos utilizadores invocar ajuda sobre o objeto acessível premindo a tecla F1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> provides you with complete information in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>fornece-lhe obter informações completas no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar e largar e permite que a origem de arrastar determinar se a operação de arrastar e largar deverá ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: The QueryContinueDrag event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: O evento de QueryContinueDrag é gerado quando existe uma alteração no estado de botão de teclado ou rato durante uma operação de arrastar e largar.

trans-unit.source: The QueryContinueDrag event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: O evento QueryContinueDrag permite que a origem de arrastar determinar se a operação de arrastar e largar deverá ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte descreve como e quando são gerados eventos relacionados com operações de arrastar e largar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>método determina o controlo na localização atual do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: -Lo, em seguida, verifica se o controlo é um destino de largar válido.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o controlo é um destino de largar válido, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>o evento é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e largar especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e largar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: As alterações na posição do cursor de rato, o estado de teclado e o estado de botão de rato são registadas.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o utilizador move fora de uma janela de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o rato entra outro controlo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>para esse controlo é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o rato se move mas permanece no controlo da mesmo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, theQueryContinueDrag event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Se houver uma alteração no estado de botão de teclado ou rato, theQueryContinueDrag evento é gerado e determina se deve continuar a arrastar, para remover os dados ou para cancelar a operação com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> do evento</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Continue`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>evento é desencadeado para continuar a operação e a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>o evento é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visual adequado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de remoção válido, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>eventos estão emparelhados, para que como o rato se move em toda a lista de destino, o utilizador recebe os comentários mais atualizadas à sua na posição o rato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Drop`, o valor do efeito de largar é devolvido para a origem de, pelo que a aplicação de origem possa efetuar a operação adequada nos dados de origem; cortar por exemplo, os dados se a operação foi uma mudança.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Cancel`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: By default, the QueryContinueDrag event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to `Cancel` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> if the ESC key was pressed and sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to `Drop` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o evento QueryContinueDrag define <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>para `Cancel` no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>se a tecla ESC foi premida e define <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>para `Drop` no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>se o botão de média, esquerdo ou direito rato é premido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Forces the re-creation of the handle for the control.
trans-unit.target: Força a criação do identificador para o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The RecreateHandle method is called whenever parameters are needed for a new control, but using a call from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateStyles%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> is insufficient.
trans-unit.target: O método de RecreateHandle é chamado sempre que os parâmetros são necessários para um novo controlo, mas utiliza uma chamada de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateStyles%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>é insuficiente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method also calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DestroyHandle%2A> and<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> and sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este método também chama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DestroyHandle%2A>e<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> e define <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A>para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DestroyHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control is currently re-creating its handle.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controlo está atualmente voltar a criar respetivo identificador.

trans-unit.source: The RecreatingHandle property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> method is still running on the control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve de propriedade RecreatingHandle `true` se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>método ainda está em execução no controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is currently re-creating its handle; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo está atualmente voltar a criar respetivo identificador; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reflects the specified message to the control that is bound to the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: Reflete a mensagem especificada para o controlo que está vinculado ao identificador especificado.

trans-unit.source: The ReflectMessage method is an infrastructure method and typically should not be called from your code.
trans-unit.target: O método ReflectMessage é um método de infraestrutura e normalmente não deve ser chamado a partir do código.

trans-unit.source: If the `hWnd` parameter does not represent a valid control, the ReflectMessage method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o `hWnd` parâmetro não representa um controlo válido, o método de ReflectMessage devolve `false`.

trans-unit.source: Because Windows messages are returned to the top-level window, the ReflectMessage method is used to propagate the return message to the control that sent the message.
trans-unit.target: Dado que as mensagens do Windows são devolvidas para a janela de nível superior, o método ReflectMessage é utilizado para propagar a mensagem de retorno para o controlo que enviou a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> representing the handle of the control to reflect the message to.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IntPtr>que representa o identificador do controlo para refletir a mensagem para.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> representing the Windows message to reflect.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> que representa a mensagem do Windows para refletir.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was reflected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem foi refletida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Força o controlo para invalidar a respectiva área cliente e imediatamente redesenhar-se automaticamente e todos os controlos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the window region associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a região da janela associada ao controlo.

trans-unit.source: The window region is a collection of pixels within the window where the operating system permits drawing.
trans-unit.target: A região da janela é uma coleção de pixels dentro da janela em que o sistema operativo permite desenho.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not display any portion of a window that lies outside of the window region.
trans-unit.target: O sistema operativo não apresenta qualquer parte de um período que se situa fora a região da janela.

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of a control's region are relative to the upper-left corner of the control, not the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas da região de um controlo são relativo para o canto superior esquerdo do controlo, não a área de cliente do controlo.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The collection of pixels contained with the region can be noncontiguous.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A coleção de pixels incluídas com a região pode ser não contíguo.

trans-unit.source: The window <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: A janela <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> associada ao controlo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Region*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Region*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Region*>

trans-unit.target: Normalmente, utiliza este método se estiver a criar ou um designer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>ou criar os seus próprios controlar incorporando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controlo é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the registered <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler> method to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>do controlo redimensionado, pode converter a `sender` parâmetro o registado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler>método para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>e obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>propriedade (ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>Propriedades individualmente).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of the Resize event.
trans-unit.target: Para processar esquemas personalizados, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>eventos em vez do evento de redimensionamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised in response to a Resize event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>o evento é gerado em resposta a um evento de redimensionamento, mas também em resposta a outras alterações que afetam o esquema do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control redraws itself when resized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controlo redesenha próprio quando redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: The ResizeRedraw property value is equivalent to the return value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> method when passing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> value as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade ResizeRedraw é equivalente ao valor de retorno o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>método ao transmitir no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>valor como um parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control redraws itself when resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo redesenha próprio quando redimensionado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Resumes usual layout logic.
trans-unit.target: Retoma a lógica de esquema habitual.

trans-unit.source: Calling the ResumeLayout method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método ResumeLayout força um esquema de imediato, se existirem quaisquer pedidos de esquema pendentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and ResumeLayout methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>e ResumeLayout métodos são utilizados em conjunto para suprimir vários <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>eventos enquanto ajustar vários atributos do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the ResumeLayout method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, normalmente iria chamar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>método, em seguida, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>Propriedades do controlo e, em seguida, invoque o método de ResumeLayout para permitir que as alterações surtam efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> for ResumeLayout to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: Não tem de ser nenhum chamadas pendentes para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>para ResumeLayout a chamar com êxito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resumes usual layout logic, optionally forcing an immediate layout of pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: Retoma a lógica de esquema habitual, opcionalmente forçar um esquema imediato de pedidos de esquema pendentes.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>método força um esquema de imediato, se existirem pedidos de esquema pendentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `performLayout` parameter is set to `true`, an immediate layout occurs if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `performLayout` parâmetro está definido como `true`, um esquema de imediato ocorre se existirem pedidos de esquema pendentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>métodos são utilizados em conjunto para suprimir vários <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>eventos enquanto ajustar vários atributos do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, normalmente iria chamar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>método, em seguida, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>Propriedades do controlo e, em seguida, chamada o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>método para permitir que as alterações surtam efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: Não tem de ser nenhum chamadas pendentes para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>a chamar com êxito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method before initializing the controls to be added.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao adicionar vários controlos a um controlo principal, recomenda-se que chamar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>método antes de inicializar os controlos para ser adicionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After adding the controls to the parent control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Depois de adicionar os controlos para o controlo principal, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.
trans-unit.target: Isto irá aumentar o desempenho das aplicações com vários controlos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to execute pending layout requests; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para executar pedidos de esquema pendentes caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance, in pixels, between the right edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a distância, em pixels, entre o limite direito de controlo e o limite esquerdo da área de cliente do respectivo contentor.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Right property is equal to the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> property value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade direita é igual à soma do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>valor da propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Right property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade direita é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: You can change this property value indirectly by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties or calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Pode alterar este valor da propriedade indiretamente alterando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>Propriedades ou chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the distance, in pixels, between the right edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>que representa a distância, em pixels, entre o limite direito de controlo e o limite esquerdo da área de cliente do respectivo contentor.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether control's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os elementos do controlo estão alinhados para suportar regiões com tipos de letra para a esquerda.

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeft property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RightToLeft é uma propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Uma propriedade de ambiente é uma propriedade de controlo que, se não estiver definida, são obtidos a partir do controlo principal.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>terá o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>como o respetivo principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>por predefinição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as propriedades de ambiente, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>classe ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>Descrição geral de classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeft property is used for international applications where the language is written from right to left, such as Hebrew or Arabic.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RightToLeft é utilizada para aplicações internacionais onde o idioma é escrito da direita para a esquerda, tais como hebraico ou árabe.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>, control elements that include text are displayed from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Quando esta propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>, são apresentados os elementos de controlo que incluam texto de direita para a esquerda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value of the RightToLeft property is changed at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se o valor da propriedade RightToLeft é alterado em tempo de execução, apenas em bruto texto sem formatação é preservado.

trans-unit.source: The following are a few examples of how control elements are affected by the RightToLeft property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName> : - Vertical scroll bars are displayed on the left side rather than right side of scrollable controls (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>).
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se alguns exemplos de como os elementos do controlo são afetados pelo valor da propriedade RightToLeft de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>:-são apresentadas barras de deslocamento Vertical do lado esquerdo em vez de um lado direito dos controlos deslocável (por exemplo, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, multilinha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - Horizontal scroll bars start with the scroll box (thumb) right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: -Barras de deslocamento horizontal começar a utilizar a caixa de deslocamento (botão) alinhada à direita.

trans-unit.source: - The check box element alignment, controlled by the `CheckAlign` property, is reversed for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: -O alinhamento do elemento de caixa de verificação, controlado pelo `CheckAlign` propriedade, é inversa para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: - Items in list box, combo box, and up-down controls are right aligned.
trans-unit.target: -Itens na caixa de listagem, caixa de combinação e controlos de segurança pendente à direita estão alinhados.

trans-unit.source: - Up and down buttons are left-aligned on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> controls.
trans-unit.target: -Acima e abaixo botões são alinhada à esquerda no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>

trans-unit.source: - Menus (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>) are displayed right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: -Menus (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>) são apresentados alinhada à direita.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: - The alignment of toolbar buttons on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control or the alignment of text on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> is not affected by the RightToLeft property.
trans-unit.target: -O alinhamento dos botões da barra de ferramentas num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>controlo ou o alinhamento do texto num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>não é afetada pela propriedade RightToLeft.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> supports right-to-left alignment; however, the effect on an ActiveX control depends on the extent to which the control author implemented support for right-to-left display.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>suporta alinhamento à direita para a esquerda; no entanto, o efeito num controlo ActiveX depende a extensão para que o autor do controlo implementado suporte para apresentação de direita para a esquerda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>alterações do valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação programática ou interação do utilizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
