trans-unit.source: Scales the control and all child controls by the specified scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta o controlo e todos os controlos subordinados pelo fator de dimensionamento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Scale method scales the control by the specified scaling `factor`.
trans-unit.target: O método de escala ajusta o controlo pelo dimensionamento especificado `factor`.

trans-unit.source: It also recursively scales all child controls if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se também em modo recursivo dimensiona todos os controlos subordinados, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> to scale each control.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, este método chama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>Dimensionar cada controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> containing the horizontal and vertical scaling factors.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> que contém os fatores de dimensionamento horizontais e verticais.

trans-unit.source: Scales the control and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta o controlo e de quaisquer controlos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: The ratio to use for scaling.
trans-unit.target: A relação entre a utilizar para dimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: Scales the entire control and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta o controlo todo e qualquer controlos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: O fator de dimensionamento horizontal.

trans-unit.source: The vertical scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: O factor de escala vertical.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines the scaling of child controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que determina a escala de controlos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: If the ScaleChildren property is `true`, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A> method will recursively call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> method of each of its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade ScaleChildren for `true`, em seguida, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A>método irá recursivamente chamada o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>método de cada um dos respectivos controlos subordinados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of ScaleChildren always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a implementação predefinida do ScaleChildren sempre `true`.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override ScaleChildren to return `false` to indicate that scaling should not be performed on their children.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas podem substituir ScaleChildren para devolver `false` para indicar que dimensionamento não deve ser efetuado nos respetivos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if child controls will be scaled when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*> method on this control is called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os controlos subordinados será ampliada quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*>método neste controlo é chamado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: Dimensiona um controlo localização, tamanho, o preenchimento e margem.

trans-unit.source: If the control is top level, this will not scale the control's location.
trans-unit.target: Se o controlo de nível superior, esta não sejam dimensionadas de localização do controlo.

trans-unit.source: This does not scale children or the size of automatically sized controls.
trans-unit.target: Isto não se dimensiona elementos subordinados ou o tamanho dos controlos de tamanho automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: You can omit scaling in any direction by changing the value of the `specified` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Pode omitir o dimensionamento em qualquer direção alterando o valor da `specified` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: O fator através do qual irão ser escalados para a altura e largura do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Activates the control.
trans-unit.target: Ativa o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The Select method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: O método Select ativa o controlo se o controlo `Selectable` bit de estilo está definido como `true` no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, está contido no outro controlo e todos os respetivos controlos de principal estão visíveis e ativados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: Os controlos de Windows Forms na lista seguinte não sejam selecionáveis.

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: Controlos derivados de controlos na lista também não podem ser selecionados.

trans-unit.source: Activates a child control.
trans-unit.target: Ativa um controlo subordinado.

trans-unit.source: Optionally specifies the direction in the tab order to select the control from.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, especifica a direção na ordem de tabulação para selecionar o controlo de.

trans-unit.source: The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls.
trans-unit.target: O `directed` e `forward` parâmetros são utilizados pelos controlos de estilo de contentor.

trans-unit.source: When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `directed` parâmetro está definido como `true`, a `forward` parâmetro é avaliado para determinar que controlam a selecionar.

trans-unit.source: When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected.
trans-unit.target: Quando `forward` está definido como `true`, é selecionado o controlo seguinte na ordem de tabulação; quando `false`, o controlo anterior na ordem de separadores é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>método ativa o controlo se o controlo `Selectable` bit de estilo está definido como `true` no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, está contido no outro controlo e todos os respetivos controlos de principal estão visíveis e ativados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Activates the next control.
trans-unit.target: Ativa o controlo seguinte.

trans-unit.source: The SelectNextControl method activates the next control in the tab order if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: O método SelectNextControl ativa o controlo seguinte na ordem de tabulação se o controlo `Selectable` bit de estilo está definido como `true` no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, está contido no outro controlo e todos os respetivos controlos de principal estão visíveis e ativados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.target: Os controlos de Windows Forms na lista seguinte não sejam selecionáveis.

trans-unit.target: Controlos derivados de controlos na lista também não podem ser selecionados.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control) When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or SelectNextControl methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>(quando não existe nenhuma ligação presente no controlo) quando altera o foco, utilizando o teclado (SEPARADOR, SHIFT + TAB e assim sucessivamente), chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>ou SelectNextControl métodos, ou definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ocorrem de eventos de foco de propriedade para o formato atual, pela seguinte ordem: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.source: Sends the control to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Envia o controlo para trás a ordem z.

trans-unit.source: The control is moved to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: O controlo é movido para trás a ordem z.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a child of another control, the child control is moved to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Se o controlo é um subordinado de outro controlo, o controlo subordinado é movido para trás a ordem z.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a top-level control, this method will not work correctly unless the control is active.
trans-unit.target: Se o controlo é um controlo de nível superior, este método não funcionará corretamente, a menos que o controlo está ativo.

trans-unit.source: A top-level control is a control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, that is not a child of another control.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo de nível superior é um controlo, tais como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, que é não um subordinado de outro controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: An active control is a visible control that has input focus.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo de Active Directory é um controlo visível que tem foco de entrada.

trans-unit.source: To use the SendToBack method with an inactive, top-level control, first call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A> method on the control.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar o método SendToBack com um controlo de nível superior, inativo, primeiro de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A>método no controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A>

trans-unit.target: Define um valor que indica como um controlo irão comportar-se quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>propriedade está ativada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Sets the bounds of the control to the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: Define os limites do controlo para a localização especificada e o tamanho.

trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified bounds of the control to the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: Define os limites do controlo especificados para a localização especificada e o tamanho.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>

trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: For any parameter not specified, the current value will be used.
trans-unit.target: Para cada parâmetro não especificado, será utilizado o valor atual.

trans-unit.source: Performs the work of setting the specified bounds of this control.
trans-unit.target: Efetua o trabalho de definição de limites especificados deste controlo.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the `specified` parameter are passed in with their current values.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, os parâmetros que correspondem aos limites não incluídos no `specified` parâmetros são transmitidos com os seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, or the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, ou o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>ou <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>propriedade pode ser transmitida com uma referência para a instância atual do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: However all values passed in are honored and applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, todos os valores transmitidos estão cumpridos e aplicados ao controlo.

trans-unit.source: The `boundsSpecified` parameter represents the elements of the controls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A> changed by your application.
trans-unit.target: O `boundsSpecified` parâmetro representa os elementos dos controlos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>alterada pela sua aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control, the `boundsSpecified` parameter value is the `Size` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>do controlo, o `boundsSpecified` valor do parâmetro é o `Size` valor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> is adjusted in response to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property being set, the `boundsSpecified` parameter value is the `None` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>é ajustada em resposta ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>propriedade que está a ser definida, o `boundsSpecified` valor do parâmetro é o `None` valor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sistemas no Windows Server 2003, o tamanho de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>é restringido pela largura em pixéis dos máximo e a altura do monitor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Define o tamanho da área do cliente do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The client area starts at the (0, 0) location and extends to the (`x`, `y`) location.
trans-unit.target: A área de cliente é iniciada à (0, 0) localização e expande para a (`x`, `y`) localização.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, não deve definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A>do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The client area width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A largura de área cliente, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The client area height, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A altura de área cliente, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Sets a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"></xref> flag to either <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define uma determinada <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"> </xref> sinalizador quer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Control style bit flags are used to categorize supported behavior.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizadores de bit de estilo de controlo são utilizadas para categorizar comportamento suportado.

trans-unit.source: A control can enable a style by calling the SetStyle method and passing in the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit (or bits) and the Boolean value to set the bit(s) to.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo pode ativar um estilo ao chamar o método SetStyle e transmitir numa apropriados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>bits (ou bits) e o valor booleano para definir o bit(s) para.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: To determine the value assigned to a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> member to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o valor atribuído a uma determinada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>bits, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>método e passar no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>Membro a avaliar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Setting the control style bits can substantially change the behavior of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Definir o controlo de bits de estilo substancialmente pode alterar o comportamento do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Review the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> enumeration documentation to understand the effects of changing the control style bits before calling the SetStyle method.
trans-unit.target: Reveja o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>documentação de enumeração para compreender os efeitos da alteração os bits de estilo de controlo antes de chamar o método SetStyle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"></xref> bit to set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"> </xref> bits para definir.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to apply the specified style to the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para aplicar o estilo especificado para o controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the control as the top-level control.
trans-unit.target: Define o controlo como o controlo de nível superior.

trans-unit.source: If you call the SetTopLevel method of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and pass in a value of `false`, the form will not be visible until you call SetTopLevelagain, passing in a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se chamar o método SetTopLevel um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>e transmita um valor de `false`, o formulário não serão visível até chamar SetTopLevelagain, passando num valor de `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to set the control as the top-level control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para definir o controlo como o controlo de nível superior; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is set to and the control is an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: O value parâmetro está definido como e o controlo é um controlo ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: The return value is not equal to the value parameter and the property is not .
trans-unit.target: O <> *> não é igual ao valor de retorno de value parâmetro e o <> *> propriedade não é .

trans-unit.source: Sets the control to the specified visible state.
trans-unit.target: Define o controlo para o estado de visível especificado.

trans-unit.source: You would typically override this method to change the visibility behavior of the control.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, substituirá este método para alterar o comportamento de visibilidade do controlo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to make the control visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para tornar o controlo visíveis; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Displays the control to the user.
trans-unit.target: Mostra o controlo de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Showing the control is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Mostrar o controlo é equivalente à definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the Show method is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property returns a value of `true` until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Depois de se chama o método Show, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>propriedade devolve um valor `true` até o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control should display focus rectangles.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controlo deve apresentar o foco.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this feature, see the[WM_CHANGEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646342\(v=vs.85\).aspx),[WM_QUERYUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646355\(v=vs.85\).aspx), and the [WM_UPDATEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646361\(v=vs.85\).aspx)topics.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre esta funcionalidade, consulte o[WM_CHANGEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646342\(v=vs.85\).aspx),[WM_QUERYUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646355\(v=vs.85\).aspx)e o [WM_UPDATEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646361\(v=vs.85\).aspx)tópicos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control should display focus rectangles; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo deve apresentar retângulos de foco; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user interface is in the appropriate state to show or hide keyboard accelerators.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a interface de utilizador está no estado adequado para mostrar ou ocultar Aceleradores de teclado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the keyboard accelerators are visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o Aceleradores teclado estão visíveis; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the site of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o site de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>, se aplicável.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height and width of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura e largura do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> class is a value type (`Structure` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Drawing.Size>classe é um tipo de valor (`Structure` no [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` no [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]), será devolvido pelo valor, que significa que aceder a propriedade devolve uma cópia do tamanho do controlo.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: So, adjusting the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> returned from this property will not affect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Por isso, ajuste o <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>ou <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Drawing.Size>devolvidos por esta propriedade não irá afetar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: To adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> of the control, you must set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> property, or set the Size property with a new <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.
trans-unit.target: Para ajustar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>do controlo, tem de definir o controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>ou de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>propriedade, defina a propriedade de tamanho com um novo <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.</xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To maintain better performance, do not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para manter um melhor desempenho, não defina a <xref:System.Drawing.Size>de um controlo no respetivo construtor.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método preferencial é substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sistemas no Windows Server 2003, o tamanho de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>é restringido pela largura em pixéis dos máximo e a altura do monitor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the height and width of the control in pixels.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a altura e largura do controlo em pixéis.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*>alterações do valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*>

trans-unit.source: It is preferable to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event to handle custom layouts.
trans-unit.target: É preferível a utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>eventos para processar esquemas personalizados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised in response to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> events, but also in other conditions when layout might need to be applied.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>o evento é gerado em resposta a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize>eventos, mas também por outras condições quando o esquema poderá ter de ser aplicadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação programática ou interação do utilizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Determines the size of the entire control from the height and width of its client area.
trans-unit.target: Determina o tamanho do controlo completo da altura e largura da respectiva área cliente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> value representing the height and width of the control's client area.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> valor que representa a altura e largura da área de cliente do controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> value representing the height and width of the entire control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> valor que representa a altura e largura do controlo completo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control style changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o estilo de controlo é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The StyleChanged event occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> flags have been added or changed.
trans-unit.target: O evento StyleChanged ocorre quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>sinalizadores foram adicionados ou alterados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the control style is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é gerado se o estilo de controlo é alterado um programática modificação ou interação do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Temporarily suspends the layout logic for the control.
trans-unit.target: Suspende temporariamente a lógica de esquema para o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The layout logic of the control is suspended until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: A lógica de esquema do controlo é suspenso até que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SuspendLayout and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: O SuspendLayout e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>métodos são utilizados em conjunto para suprimir vários <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>eventos enquanto ajustar vários atributos do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the SuspendLayout method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, seria normalmente chamar o método SuspendLayout, em seguida, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>Propriedades do controlo e, em seguida, chamada o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>método para permitir que as alterações surtam efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to SuspendLayout for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: Não tem de ser nenhum chamadas pendentes para SuspendLayout para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>a chamar com êxito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the SuspendLayout method before initializing the controls to be added.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao adicionar vários controlos a um controlo principal, recomenda-se que chame o método de SuspendLayout antes de inicializar os controlos para ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: After adding the controls to the parent control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Depois de adicionar os controlos para o controlo principal, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.
trans-unit.target: Isto irá aumentar o desempenho das aplicações com vários controlos.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the system colors change.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando alterar as cores do sistema.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors> is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado se a <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>é alterada por uma modificação programática ou interação do utilizador.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tab order of the control within its container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ordem de separadores do controlo dentro do respetivo contentor.

trans-unit.source: A tab index can consist of any valid integer greater than or equal to zero, lower numbers being earlier in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Um índice de separador pode consistir em qualquer válido de número inteiro maior que ou igual a zero, números inferiores a ser anterior na ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: If more than one control on the same parent control has the same tab index, the z-order of the controls determines the order to cycle through the controls.
trans-unit.target: Se mais do que um controlo no mesmo controlo principal tem o mesmo índice de separador, a ordem z dos controlos determina a ordem a percorra os controlos.

trans-unit.source: For a control to be included in the tab order, its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para um controlo a ser incluído na ordem de tabulação, respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>propriedade tem de ser definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index value of the control within the set of controls within its container.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice do controlo dentro do conjunto de controlos dentro do respetivo contentor.

trans-unit.source: The controls in the container are included in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Os controlos no contentor são incluídos na ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex*>alterações do valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação programática ou interação do utilizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this control using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o utilizador pode dar o foco para este controlo utilizando a tecla de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador premir a tecla de tabulação, o foco de entrada é definido para o controlo seguinte na ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: Controls with the TabStop property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Controlos com o valor da propriedade TabStop de `false` não estão incluídos na coleção de controlos na ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: The tab order can be manipulated by setting the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Ordem de tabulação pode ser manipulada ao definir o controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can give the focus to the control using the TAB key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o utilizador pode dar o foco ao controlo utilizando a tecla de tabulação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property will always return <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolverá sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> para uma instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>alterações do valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação programática ou interação do utilizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains data about the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto que contém dados sobre o controlo.

trans-unit.source: Any type derived from the <xref:System.Object> class can be assigned to this property.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer tipo derivado de <xref:System.Object>classe pode ser atribuída a esta propriedade.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the Tag property is set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade da etiqueta é definida através do estruturador de Windows Forms, texto só pode ser atribuído.

trans-unit.source: A common use for the Tag property is to store data that is closely associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: É uma utilização comum para a propriedade de Tag armazenar dados que estão estreitamente associados com o controlo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a control that displays information about a customer, you might store a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains the customer's order history in that control's Tag property so the data can be accessed quickly.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se tiver um controlo que apresenta informações sobre um cliente, pode armazenar um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>que contém o histórico de encomendas do cliente na propriedade de Tag do controlo que para os dados possam ser acedidos rapidamente.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém dados sobre o controlo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto associado este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The Text property of the control is used differently by each derived class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Text do controlo é utilizada em forma diferente pelo cada classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: For example the Text property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is displayed in the title bar at the top of the form, is fairly small in character count, and usually displays the application or document name.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo a propriedade de texto de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>é apresentado na barra de título na parte superior do formulário, é bastante pequeno na contagem de caráter e, normalmente, apresenta o nome de aplicação ou documento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: However, the Text property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> can be large and can include numerous nonvisual characters used to format the text.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, a propriedade de texto de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>podem ser grandes e pode incluir carateres nonvisual várias utilizadas para formatar o texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, the text displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> can be formatted by adjusting the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> properties, or by the addition of spaces or tab characters to align the text.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o texto apresentado num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>pode ser formatado ao ajustar o <xref:System.Drawing.Font>Propriedades, ou a adição de espaços ou carateres de separador alinhar o texto.</xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: O texto associado este controlo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*>alterações do valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação programática ou interação do utilizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance, in pixels, between the top edge of the control and the top edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância, em pixels, entre o limite superior do controlo e o limite superior da área de cliente do respectivo contentor.

trans-unit.source: The Top property value is equivalent to the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade superior é equivalente à <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and Top property values cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> property value of the control to change.
trans-unit.target: As alterações efetuadas a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>e valores de propriedade superior causa a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A>do controlo para alterar o valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the distance, in pixels, between the bottom edge of the control and the top edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>que representa a distância, em pixels, entre o limite inferior do controlo e o limite superior da área de cliente do respectivo contentor.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent control that is not parented by another Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o controlo de principal não é principal por outro controlo Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is the outermost <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that the control is contained in.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, este é o mais exterior <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> contido no controlo.

trans-unit.source: The top-level control is defined as the parent control that is not parented by another Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de nível superior é definido como o controlo de principal não é principal por outro controlo Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is the outermost <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that the control is contained in.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, trata-se mais exterior <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>que o controlo está suplemento nele contidos</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the control is contained on an MDI child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, then the top-level control is the Multiple Document Interface (MDI) parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o controlo está contido num MDI subordinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>em seguida, o controlo de nível superior é o principal de vários documentos Interface (MDI) <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: If the control is not parented on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, this property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o controlo não é principal num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, esta propriedade irá devolver `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the top-level control that contains the current control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que representa o controlo de nível superior que contém o controlo atual.

trans-unit.source: Causes the control to redraw the invalidated regions within its client area.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que o controlo de redesenhar as regiões inválidas na respectiva área cliente.

trans-unit.source: Updates the bounds of the control with the current size and location.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza os limites do controlo com o tamanho atual e a localização.

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control is different from the previous <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>do controlo é diferente do anterior <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> of the control changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>as alterações de controlo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: Updates the bounds of the control with the specified size and location.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza os limites do controlo com o tamanho especificado e a localização.

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control if different from the previous <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>do controlo se for diferente do anterior <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> of the control changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, é o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>as alterações de controlo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*> coordinate of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*>coordenada do controlo.</xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*> coordinate of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*>coordenada do controlo.</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>do controlo.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>do controlo.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Updates the bounds of the control with the specified size, location, and client size.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza os limites do controlo com o tamanho especificado, a localização e o tamanho de cliente.

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control is different from the previous <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>do controlo é diferente do anterior <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> of the control changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>as alterações de controlo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*> coordinate of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*>coordenada do controlo.</xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*> coordinate of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*>coordenada do controlo.</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*>

trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>do controlo.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>

trans-unit.source: The client <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> of the control.
trans-unit.target: O cliente <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>do controlo.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The client <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> of the control.
trans-unit.target: O cliente <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>do controlo.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Forces the assigned styles to be reapplied to the control.
trans-unit.target: Força os estilos atribuídos a reaplicada ao controlo.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> method to get the styles to apply.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>método para obter os estilos a aplicar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>

trans-unit.source: The styles assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> assigned to the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> property are reapplied.
trans-unit.target: Os estilos atribuídos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>atribuído para o controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>propriedade são reaplicada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control is repainted to reflect the style changes if necessary.
trans-unit.target: O controlo é repainted para refletir as alterações de estilo, se necessário.

trans-unit.source: The UpdateStyles method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: O método UpdateStyles não tem qualquer efeito se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>valor da propriedade é `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>

trans-unit.source: Updates the control in its parent's z-order.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o controlo na ordem z do respetivo elemento principal.

trans-unit.source: The UpdateZOrder method updates the position of the control in its parent control's z-order.
trans-unit.target: O método UpdateZOrder atualiza a posição do controlo na ordem z do seu controlo principal.

trans-unit.source: For example, if this control is a newly created control that was added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>, the z-order is updated with the new control added to the back.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se este controlo está a controlar recentemente criado que foi adicionado a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>, a ordem z é atualizada com o novo controlo adicionado à cópia de segurança.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the wait cursor for the current control and all child controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve utilizar o cursor de espera para o controlo atual e todos os controlos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: Use a wait cursor whenever you perform an operation that takes a noticeable amount of time.However, note that operations that block the UI thread will also block acursor change.Therefore, this property should only be used when performing time-consuming operations in another thread.
trans-unit.target: Utilize um cursor de espera sempre que efetuar uma operação que assume uma quantidade considerável de tempo. No entanto, tenha em atenção que as operações que bloqueia o thread de IU também irão bloquear acursor alteração. Por conseguinte, esta propriedade só deve ser utilizada quando executar operações morosa no outro thread.

trans-unit.source: To change the cursor globally and immediately, seethe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o cursor global e imediatamente, seethe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the wait cursor for the current control and all child controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para utilizar o cursor de espera para o controlo atual e todos os controlos subordinados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is finished validating.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controlo é concluído a validação.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is validating.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controlo está a ser validada.

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Quando altera o foco, utilizando o teclado (SEPARADOR, SHIFT + TAB e assim sucessivamente), chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>métodos, ou definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ocorrem de eventos de foco de propriedade para o formato atual, pela seguinte ordem: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>3.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>4.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>

trans-unit.source: Validating 5.
trans-unit.target: Validar a 5.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> 6.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>6.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>Quando altera o foco, utilizando o rato ou ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>ocorrem de eventos de foco de método, pela seguinte ordem: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>3.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>4.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> 5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>5.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>

trans-unit.source: Validating 6.
trans-unit.target: Validar a 6.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the Validating and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>propriedade está definida como `false`, a validação e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>eventos são suprimidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the Validating event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the Validating event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>está definido como `true` no delegado do evento de validação, todos os eventos que normalmente ocorreriam depois do evento de validação são suprimidos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Do not attempt to set focus from within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>, Validating, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Não tente definir o foco a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>, validação, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>processadores de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding.
trans-unit.target: Se o fizer, pode fazer com que a aplicação ou o sistema operativo deixar de responder.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the `WM_KILLFOCUS` topic in the "Keyboard Input Reference" section, and the "Message Deadlocks" section of the "About Messages and Message Queues" topic in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o `WM_KILLFOCUS` tópico a secção "Referência de entrada do teclado" e a secção "Impasses de mensagem" o tópico "Sobre mensagens e filas de mensagens" na biblioteca do MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control and all its child controls are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controlo e todos os respectivos controlos subordinados são apresentados.

trans-unit.source: Note that even if `Visible` is set to `true`, the control might not be visible to the user if it is obscured behind other controls.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que, mesmo se `Visible` está definido como `true`, o controlo poderá não estar visível ao utilizador se de que está a ficar obscurecido atrás outros controlos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control and all its child controls are displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo e todos os respectivos controlos subordinados são apresentados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*>alterações do valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação programática ou interação do utilizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the Width and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> property values cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> property value of the control to change.
trans-unit.target: As alterações efetuadas a largura e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>causa de valores de propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>do controlo para alterar o valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width of the control in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A largura do controlo em pixéis.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: The NativeWindow contained within the control.
trans-unit.target: O NativeWindow contido no controlo.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the WndProc method after getting filtered through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Todas as mensagens são enviadas para o método WndProc após obter filtrada através o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WndProc method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: O método WndProc corresponde exatamente a do Windows `WindowProc` função.

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the [WindowProc function](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o processamento de mensagens do Windows, consulte o [WindowProc função](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565).

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: O Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> ao processo.
